archimate:Node.name: [SBB] Stealtwatch
archimate:Node.documentation: Network Security Monitoring The StealthwatchÂ® System provides industry-leading network visibility and security intelligence for faster more precise threat detection, incident response, and forensics. Using Netflow and other telemetry data from existing infrastructure, the system cost-effectively turns the entire network into a sensor grid. It detects anomalous traffic and behaviors, including zero-day malware, distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks, insider threats, and advanced persistent threats (APTs).
